title: Beginner's Guide: Creating Detailed Prompts for MidJourney
tldr: Master MidJourney with structured prompts that combine subject, style, lighting, and mood for consistent creative results.

questions.q: What makes a good MidJourney prompt?
questions.a: Specific subjects with clear attributes, defined style and mood, detailed lighting and colors, plus exclusions for unwanted elements.

questions.q: How do I improve my MidJourney results?
questions.a: Use the prompt structure: [Subject] with [Attributes], in [Style], featuring [Lighting], including [Details]. Add parameters like --ar and --v 6.
--ar for aspect ratio, --v 6 for latest model, --q 2 for higher quality, and --no to exclude unwanted elements.
